snippet: Second seed Andy Murray survived a ferocious Jo-Wilfried Tsonga fightback to reach the Wimbledon semi-finals for the seventh time, winning the Wednesday's second Centre Court blockbuster 7-6(10) 6-1 3-6 4-6 6-1....
lead_paragraph: Second seed Andy Murray survived a ferocious Jo-Wilfried Tsonga fightback to reach the Wimbledon semi-finals for the seventh time, winning the Wednesday's second Centre Court blockbuster 7-6(10) 6-1 3-6 4-6 6-1.

headline.print_headline: Murray Survives Tsonga Comeback to Reach Semis
headline.main: Murray Survives Tsonga Comeback to Reach Semis
